correctness.rationale: Several core fields are correct and traceable (materialDeposited=InGaZnO; TALD with In–Ga single precursor and DEZn; O3 co-reactant; reactor and manufacturer; T=150 °C; filmThickness=24.3 nm; band gap at 150 °C=3.26 eV; roughness≈0.34 nm; film density≈5.9 g/cm3; device metrics μ=10.4 cm2/V·s, SS=90 mV/dec, on/off≈2×10^9; top‑gate bottom‑contact), but there are multiple schema violations, placeholders, and factual issues: 1) Null/placeholder values violate schema and guidance (no empty/null): reactantSelection.carrierGas='Not Found'; processParameters.plasmaPower=None; pressure.quantityValue=None; thicknessControl.growthPerCycle=None; nucleationPeriod.quantityValue=None; materialProperties.electricalProperties.resistivity/carrierDensity/mobility=None; uniformity.variation.quantityValue=None; conformality.aspectRatio.quantityValue=None; filmComposition.elementalConcentration.values.quantityValue=None; supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles=None; otherAspects.safety='Not Found'. These must be populated with valid values or omitted where optional (but pressure, uniformity, conformality, etc. are required and need valid entries). 2) Unit error for film density: value 5.9 is paired with GM-PER-DeciM3 (g/dm3). The article reports 5.9 g/cm3, which corresponds to 5900 g/dm3. Numeric value or unit must be corrected to be QUDT-consistent. 3) DeviceProperties.thresholdVoltage is incorrect: 0.6 V in the paper is a ΔV_TH under PBS, not the actual V_TH. Provide true V_TH (not reported) or omit this field. 4) Crystallinity characterization method is incorrect: set to XRR, which measures thickness/density, not phase. The article does not explicitly report a crystallinity measurement; if “amorphous” is asserted, use an appropriate method (e.g., XRD) or remove/justify; currently it is not traceable. 5) Substrate is imprecise: the IGZO was deposited on 150‑nm ITO‑coated glass for devices (and separate films on thermally oxidized Si for characterization). “glass” is incomplete. 6) Required process details missing: pressure value (and unit), dosing/purge times, flow rates, nucleationPeriod, and thicknessControl.numberofCycles (the article states 120 supercycles; this should be captured appropriately). 7) supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles is left as None; if counts per subcycle are unknown, omit this property rather than using null, but ensure required supercycle/cycle counts are represented elsewhere per schema. 8) saturation flag is set False without support from the article. Review or justify. To correct: replace all None/Not Found with valid schema-compliant values (or remove optional fields); fix filmDensity unit/value; remove or correct thresholdVoltage; update substrate to ITO-coated glass (or specify the exact substrate for this process instance); add 120 as a cycle count where appropriate; either supply or remove dosing/purge/flow/pressure values; correct crystallinity characterization method or remove if not substantiated.

completeness.rationale: Very incomplete and partly incorrect. (1) Multiple processes missing: the article reports three distinct ALD IGZO depositions/devices at 130, 150, and 170 °C; only one process (150 °C) is extracted. Each temperature should be a separate process with its own film thickness (21.4/24.3/27.4 nm), band gap (3.81/3.26/3.21 eV), roughness (0.30/0.34/0.46 nm), and device mobility (6.1/10.4/14.8 cm2 V-1 s-1). (2) Schema violations and nulls: many fields are present with null or placeholder values (e.g., processParameters.plasmaPower=null, pressure.quantityValue=null, thicknessControl.growthPerCycle=null, nucleationPeriod.quantityValue=null; materialProperties.electricalProperties.resistivity/carrierDensity/mobility=null; uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, elementalConcentration.values all null). The schema forbids nulls and requires valid QUDT-compliant values; thicknessControl also lists required subfields that are not properly populated. (3) Misassigned value: deviceProperties.thresholdVoltage is set to 0.6 V, but the paper only reports ΔVTH under PBS (0.6 V) and NBIS (-3.2 V) for the 150 °C device; absolute VTH is not provided. This should be removed or corrected. (4) Substrate is incomplete/incorrect: devices used ITO-coated glass and films for characterization were also deposited on Si; the extracted “glass” is not traceable and mixes contexts. (5) Missing or speculative fields: carrierGas is marked “Not Found” (not traceable), deliveryMethod is “Not Found,” saturation set to False without support, supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles=null; number of ALD supercycles (120) is not captured in growthPerCycle.numberofCycles. (6) Crystallinity marked “amorphous by XRR” is not supported by the text (XRR was used for density/thickness, not phase). To improve completeness, add two additional processes (130 °C and 170 °C) and populate: temperature, substrate (ITO-coated glass for TFT; or create separate processes for Si characterization), film thickness, band gap, roughness, mobility, on/off ratio (~2.2×10^9), SS (min 90 mV/dec at 150 °C), and remove or properly fill all fields currently null/placeholder (pressure, growthPerCycle with numberofCycles=120, carrier/purging gases, uniformity/conformality, elemental concentration). Remove incorrect thresholdVoltage or replace with the actual VTH if reported.
